message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $120. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $110. Don't miss out on this chance to own a product that is truly worth more than what you're paying for. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make a purchase.
